nodes.text: At some point between 1.5 ABY and 3 ABY, he acquired files which implicated Corporate Sector Authority Viceprex Karrek Flim of leveling several old-grown forests in the Corellian system. Didina Lippinoss hired a passing spacer to recover these files. Huusir made no attempt to persuade or negotiate with the spacer, instead firing on the spacer at first sight. The spacer promptly killed Huusir and returned the files to Lippinoss.

Bin Huusir appeared as a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
